#!/bin/zsh
yroot columbo_test --cmd "yinst install perlbase perl58_compat" yroot columbo_test --cmd "yinst install -br test ~/.hudson/jobs/columbo/lastStable/archive/pkg/yellowstone_columbo_perl-*.tgz" yroot columbo_test --cmd "~/src/ckoenig/hudson/columbo_syntax_check.sh"
GATEWAYS=(af1183.yss.ac4.yahoo.com ysadm1000.yss.ac2.yahoo.com ysadm1001.yss.sk1.yahoo.com) for HOST in $GATEWAYS; do scp ~/.hudson/jobs/columbo/lastStable/archive/pkg/yellowstone_columbo_perl-*.tgz $HOST:/tmp/latest_columbo_package.tgz ssh $HOST "sudo /usr/local/bin/yinst install perlbase perl58_compat" ssh $HOST "sudo /usr/local/bin/yinst install -br test /tmp/latest_columbo_package.tgz" done
echo "Running test scripts in t/ directory..." TEST_FILES=`ls /home/ckoenig/.hudson/jobs/columbo/workspace/src/perl/t/*.pl` for TEST in ${=TEST_FILES}; do yroot columbo_test --cmd "/usr/local/bin/perl $TEST" done
# Now that it's working elsewhere, install it as a link package, outside of the yroot: yroot columbo_test --cmd "yinst --create --buildtype=link ~/src/columbo/pkg/yellowstone_columbo_perl.yicf" yinst install ./yellowstone_columbo_perl-*.L*.tgz
~/src/ckoenig/hudson/remove_yroot.sh columbo_test
